name: Asteroidal
description:
Asteroidal is a turn-based strategy LAN multiplayer game where you gather resources and fight your opponent with spaceships.

You can mine resources, refine them and use them to research upgrades for better spaceships (or better resource gathering).

The goal is to claim all enemy squares.

You will need a friend to play LAN with!

CONTROLS:

  • W, A, S & D to move camera
  • LMB to select
  • Esc to deselect asteroid
  • L-Ctrl to skip turn

EXTRA INFO:

  • The support ship can heal other ships if it's in close proximity
  • WHITE indicates ship move range RED indicates ship attack range.
  • You can click on the top square of the refinery menu to change it's type

The game is pretty much finished. Although, I am still open for suggestions / bug reports. This is my first "big" game so please be friendly :D
